name: Userstyles - Comment Numbering/Permalink v.119
description: ▶ New : Work Too with Greasy Forum - Add Numbers to Comments in GreasyFork and UserStyles forum - Reveal the Comment's Permalink in Forum's discussion with a ToolTip (on hover). - Reveal the comment Number of each discussion. ▶ Work great with my Userstyles: Userstyles / Greasy Fork Enhancer Dark-Grey Userstyles - Large Edit On Focus ▶ Support for GM: GreasyFork Bullshit Filter - for TS Citrus Gfork GreasyFork Bullshit Filter ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) Some preferences: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre> - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : DECEMBRE Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: decembre (USO Mirror) in GreasyFork by example: UserScripts WideScreen Dark/Grey(USO Mirror) Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey 59.1 (addStylish lib) - leoncastro ( GreasyFork) I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

additional_info: Change : ▶ Support for GM: GreasyFork Bullshit Filter - for TS Citrus Gfork GreasyFork Bullshit Filter - Correction for Domains - Correction for USERSTYLES REVIEW: https://forum.userstyles.org/categories/style-reviews - Correction for Greasy Fork - Counter for Discussion Lists - Script Name on line line and Add Icon Script before in Scripts Discussion List in Greasy Fork. - Fix Rating Icon This Userstyles Use CLIP CSS : - rect(v1, v2, v3, v4) : v1 début de la zone visible verticale, v2 fin de la zone visible horizontale, v3 fin de la zone visible verticale, v4 début de la zone visible horizontale. L'unité "%" ne semble pas être acceptée. For the tooltip , the original idea came from: Use Cases for Multiple Pseudo Elements
